answers.answer: it is normal to experience impotence with diabetes. It usually occurs when the blood sugars are not in control. The pain I'm not sure of. I had that problem but was diagnosed with endometriosis.

question: I am 35 years old I have had diabetis for 3 years and I have no sex drive at all, and if I do having sex really hurts me, I am wondering if this is normal or not?  What can I do
title: No sex drive/pain with sex
